#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
char s[1000];
int test,n,k,x;
int main(){
    scanf("%d\n",&test);
    while (test--){
        scanf("%s %d\n",s+1,&k);n=strlen(s+1);x=0;
        for (int i=1; i<=n; i++) x=(x*10+s[i]-'0')%k;
        if (x==0) printf("YES\n"); else printf("NO\n");
    }
}
